    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
In an electrifying contest under the floodlights, Real Madrid faced Eibar at the Santiago Bernabeu. The game was set with Real Madrid seeking to solidify their dominance in the league, while Eibar were eager to improve their standings with a robust performance. The home team eventually triumphed with a decisive 3-0 victory, showcasing their clinical finishing and resilience.

The match commenced with Real Madrid kicking off proceedings. The first few minutes saw both teams getting a grip on the game with Real Madrid looking the more aggressive of the two. Just one minute and forty-six seconds into the match, Real Madrid committed a foul, giving Eibar an opportunity to get into the game through an indirect free-kick. However, it was Real Madrid who first threatened to break the deadlock with a shot on target in the third minute. Unfortunately for them, the ball went out of play, leading to a corner kick. Real Madrid continued to press, but Eibar's resolute defense held firm, dealing with the early pressure.

Even though Eibar managed to clear the ball multiple times in the opening ten minutes, Real Madrid maintained their high tempo, continually advancing into the opposing half. A notable chance came in the 14th minute when Real Madrid produced a shot on target that eventually went out of play, resulting in another corner. The hosts were relentless, with numerous shots on target keeping the Eibar goalkeeper busy.

The breakthrough came in the 21st minute after a series of attempts. A well-executed free-kick from Real Madrid left the Eibar defense stationary, resulting in the first goal of the match. Following the goal, Eibar took over the kick-off but found it tough to keep the ball in play and secure any meaningful possession. At the 26th-minute mark, Eibar's first real chance emerged, but it ended with a shot off target.

The first half proceeded with Real Madrid dominating the game, exhibiting why they are considered one of the top teams in European football. The 30th minute saw another well-crafted goal from Real Madrid after sustained pressure, doubling their lead and indicating their superiority in attack. Shortly after Eibar’s restart, Real Madrid continued their offensive by forcing multiple saves and missing by narrow margins.

The last 15 minutes of the first half saw a flurry of activity, with both teams engaged in some physical challenges leading to fouls and free-kicks. Eibar’s attempts to find the net were consistently thwarted by a steadfast Real Madrid defense and an alert goalkeeper. Meanwhile, the home side squared off with several shots on target, all being efficiently dealt with by the Eibar goalkeeper. The half concluded with Real Madrid firmly in the lead, 2-0 up, having displayed clinical finishing and control over the pace of the game.

The second half started with Eibar making a substitution, perhaps in an attempt to turn their fortunes around. Real Madrid, however, were undeterred and immediately went on the offensive following the kick-off. Within three minutes, Real Madrid had garnered another shot on target, showcasing their relentless pursuit of more goals. It was quickly followed by a series of set pieces and throw-ins as the home side continued to tighten their grip on the game.

Around the 4th minute, Eibar's persistent fouls began to hamper their rhythm, with another yellow card being issued in the 4th minute for a reckless tackle. This set the tone for Real Madrid to continue dominating possession, forcing Eibar to clear the ball multiple times in desperate defense. Real Madrid brought urgency to their game, creating more chances and keeping their opponents on the back foot. A notable incident around the 18-minute mark was Real Madrid making two substitutions, which provided fresh legs and added creativity to their gameplay.

Eibar did manage a few moments where they tested Real Madrid's defense with shots on target, but the solidity at the back for Madrid with timely clearances kept the danger at bay. A defining moment came in the 37th minute of the second half when Real Madrid's incessant pressure bore fruit yet again. A remarkable move culminated in another goal, extending their lead to 3-0 and effectively putting the game out of reach for Eibar.

As the match neared its end, Real Madrid continued their commanding performance by maintaining ball possession and launching additional attacks. Even though Eibar's efforts did not entirely vanish, any attempts they made were efficiently countered. The match saw several fouls and subsequent free-kicks, resulting from Eibar’s frustration, capping off a physical contest.

Overall, the match was demonstrative of Real Madrid's superiority, clinical precision, and tactical acumen. Their consistent pressure, remarkable transitions between attack and defense, and the ability to convert crucial chances define this emphatic victory. Eibar, while showing moments of resilience and defensive sturdiness, ultimately fell short against a formidable opponent. Real Madrid's victory consolidated their standing as a powerhouse in La Liga, reflecting the team's collective strength and individual brilliance, solidifying the narrative of their continued dominance in Spanish football.
